info.author: Gillian Gold gillian.gold@yale.edu
info.abstract:
The KC Import component creates new KC models in the student-step roll up (exported from DataShop).
After editing the KC export file (from the KC Export component), select one or more new KC models. They must have unique names and not already exist in the student-step roll up. Do not change any of the values or headers in either files.
info.inputs:
Student-step export from DataShop
KC Import file (edited output file from KC Export component)
info.outputs: Student-step roll up containing the new KC models
info.options: KC Models -- Select new KC models from the KC Import that have unique names and do not already exist in the student-step. Multiple selection is allowed.
